meaningMnemonic: They <radical>say</radical> <radical>someone</radical> with <kanji>various</kanji> talents is important. Various talents can include speaking various languages so if you are someone who knows various languages you can say things that various peoples will comprehend.
readingMnemonic: You’re so good at speaking <kanji>various</kanji> languages that you decide to put on a <reading>sho</reading>w (しょ). At the show, you say a lot of things in various languages and everyone is impressed.
